=== Translations overview ===

Translations are managed in different places.

==== Translation of Lubuntu specific components ====
Lubuntu's slideshow (presentation during the installation) is translated on <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/ubiquity-slideshow-ubuntu/trunk|Launchpad]]</nowiki>.

Others translations of Lubuntu specific applications are on https://translations.launchpad.net/lubuntu (on the left of the page).

==== Translations of main Ubuntu components ====
Translations for common Ubuntu components installed on Lubuntu, are managed on <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/ubuntu |Launchpad]]</nowiki>.
